entry.title: Understanding Privacy: Protect Your Users, Protect Yourself
entry.summary: All of us want to create inclusive, safe, and privacy-aware digital experiences, but where to begin? Our brand new Smashing Book, “Understanding Privacy,” written by Heather Burns, can help you lay the ground for future developers, designers, and project managers to build a better web for tomorrow. [Jump to the details](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2022/12/understanding-privacy-new-smashing-book/#about-the-book) or [get the book right away](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/printed-books/understanding-privacy/).

entry.title: Optimizing A Vue App
entry.summary: Prioritizing performance when building our web apps improves the user experience and helps ensure they can be used by as many people as possible. In this article, Michelle Barker will walk you through some of the front-end optimization tips to keep our Vue apps as efficient as possible.

entry.title: A Guide To Keyboard Accessibility: JavaScript (Part 2)
entry.summary: This article is the second of two parts about a guide to making websites accessible to keyboard users. Here Cristian Diaz covers a toolset on JavaScript that you can mix into different components to create a great experience for keyboard users.

entry.title: A Guide To Image Optimization On Jamstack Sites

entry.title: Using Automated Test Results To Improve Accessibility
